DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of HMPL-004 in patients with active mild to moderate ulcerative colitis (UC), compared with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study of HMPL-004 in Patients With Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Have active confirmed mild to moderate ulcerative colitis Diagnosed with Crohn's Disease or
